Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and reflect on progress made throughout the week.
Finalize the blockouts for the current week, ensuring all feedback has been implemented.
Prepare a document summarizing the week's work on blockouts, challenges faced, and solutions implemented.
Share the summary document with the entire development team for visibility.
Plan focus areas for the following week based on feedback and progress made.
Take time to relax and browse level design inspiration websites.
Check emails and respond to any messages, wrapping up any loose ends before the weekend.
Log out and end the workweek.
